item.title: 138/need 99 def for turmoil want 126cb/30cb for turm
item.dc:creator: @taintedhappy taintedhappy
item.description:
@taintedhappy wrote:

i cant not change my cb level at all the server i have this: in player.java not client.java im pretty sure thats right then changing that u need def for turmoil i cant do it help plz =)
public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
    }
    return 99;
}
